attributes.action: secure the long term future of the hartlepool general hospital.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the towns people have been ignored when it comes to the provision of a replacement hospital in wynyard. There are a lot more people opposed to the new hospital than wants it...and their views have been ignored. services transfared to the north tees, that were promised would remain in the general, makeing it necissary for the towns people to go out of town for treatment, which is totally unacceptable.why can`t these services remain in the town, why can`t the general be braught up to standard, rather than money being spent on an unwanted building,this would be more economic.secure the long term future of the hartlepool general hospital for hartlepool
